channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Survey finds 51% of college presidents alarmed by Trump's return
item.description: A little over half of college presidents responding to an annual survey fear that President Trump's second administration will hurt higher education.

item.title: Trump Must Put an End to Biden’s Environmental Injustice
item.description: Nobody did this to you, environmental activists. You did it to yourselves.

item.title: Senate DOGE Republican pushes bill to bring government computer systems 'out of the stone age'
item.description: DOGE caucus chair Sen. Joni Ernst, R-Iowa, is pushing for the upper chamber to approve the SOMOSA Act to bring government computer systems up to date.

item.title: Here’s How Trump’s Department Of Transportation Can Make It Easier For Americans To Start Families
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy signed a memo reorienting all federal transportation funding toward supporting marriage and families.

item.title: Federal judge pauses Trump's federal worker buyout plan
item.description: A federal judge in Boston on Thursday temporarily halted the Trump administration's mass buyout plan for federal workers.

item.description: After enduring Joe Biden’s lectures and threats, Benjamin Netanyahu will no doubt be resting a lot easier on his flight home from Washington this trip...

item.description: By withdrawing from the Paris accord, Trump is offering a number of nations a helpful excuse for dodging commitments they had little intention of keep...

item.title: Congressional Committee Wants Data FBI Claimed Was ‘Corrupted’ In Unsolved J6 Pipe Bomb Case
item.description: At minimum, the FBI should be able to articulate where its investigations led.

item.title: Birthright Citizenship: The Supreme Court Precedents Loom Large
item.description: Trump can only win his case by getting the Supreme Court to overrule its own precedent or reject its reasoning.

item.title: Try Telling This Dad Whose Daughter Was Killed By An Illegal That Open Borders Are ‘Compassionate’
item.description: Police say 20-year-old Katie Abraham was killed in a Jan. 19 car crash by a drunk driver, allegedly an illegal immigrant with a false identity.

item.title: Conservatives Can’t Allow Wisconsin’s Upcoming Supreme Court Race To Fall Through The Cracks
item.description: 'This crucial election has national impacts and will require national support,' said Sen. Ron Johnson, R-Wis.

item.title: ICE hits limit on detention beds, releases migrants
item.description: Homeland Security's deportation agency has bumped up against its detention bed space limit and has begun to release illegal immigrants.
